message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Risk-off Friday: broad selling across IT, consumer and renewables; exchanges soft (BSE at key support, MCX back below 8000). Autos mixed with ASHOKLEY firm; copper/metals pulled back to supports (HINDCOPPER, SAIL, JINDALSTEL). PSU banks eased. Liquidity was high in IDEA, SUZLON, ASHOKLEY, BEL, HINDCOPPER. Several setups sit near clear Monday triggers; no trades executed today.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "AUBANK", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Closed near 743–745 resistance; strength above 745 with volume can extend trend", "price": 743.20},
    {"symbol": "ASHOKLEY", "signal": "Pullback-to-breakout watch", "reason": "Strong close; continuation only on push >144.5 and hold", "price": 141.93},
    {"symbol": "SBICARD", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Coiling below 890; sustained move and hold above 890 triggers momentum", "price": 873.85},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Pullback buy watch", "reason": "Heavy-volume week; pulled back to 310–312 support—look for reclaim >318/322", "price": 311.97},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Momentum continuation watch", "reason": "Trend intact; needs reclaim of 402/406.5 with volume for continuation", "price": 395.90},
    {"symbol": "MCX", "signal": "Reclaim watch", "reason": "Lost 8000 on close; constructive only on reclaim >8000–8050", "price": 7920.50},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Base-building watch", "reason": "Hovering at 2040–2060 support; turn constructive only back above 2085–2090", "price": 2043.20},
    {"symbol": "JINDALSTEL", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Structure intact; 1070 remains the trigger for expansion", "price": 1029.50},
    {"symbol": "GRSE", "signal": "Trend watch", "reason": "Pullback to 2610 zone; momentum resumes above 2745", "price": 2611.50},
    {"symbol": "HAL", "signal": "Momentum continuation", "reason": "Defence strong; follow-through above ~4825 needed", "price": 4736.10},
    {"symbol": "IDEA", "signal": "Speculative bounce watch", "reason": "Very high volume; consider only on strength >8.35 with tight risk", "price": 8.02},
    {"symbol": "SUZLON", "signal": "Avoid/needs reclaim", "reason": "Breakdown toward 55; consider only on reclaim >57.5/58.5", "price": 55.28},
    {"symbol": "PIDILITIND", "signal": "Breakdown watch", "reason": "Lost 1480 support; avoid unless reclaim >1495–1500", "price": 1474.80},
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "signal": "Support watch", "reason": "Pulled back to 131; strength only on reclaim >134 with volume", "price": 131.02},
    {"symbol": "JUBLFOOD", "signal": "Reversal watch", "reason": "Weak close; bounce valid only on reclaim >620 then 632", "price": 606.90}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 25000.00,
    "total_value": 25000.00,
    "holdings_count": 0,
    "holdings": []
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Sector tone: IT, consumer discretionary and renewables weak; autos mixed (ASHOKLEY resilient); metals/copper pulled back to key supports (HINDCOPPER, SAIL, JINDALSTEL); PSU banks eased; exchanges soft (BSE near support, MCX <8000).",
    "High-volume cues today: IDEA, SUZLON, ASHOKLEY, BEL, HINDCOPPER—use volume confirmation on any Monday triggers.",
    "Most constructive Monday triggers (fit for ₹25k): ASHOKLEY >144.5; AUBANK >745; SBICARD >890 (smaller size); BEL >402/406.5; HINDCOPPER reclaim >318/322. Avoid chasing gap-ups—prefer breakout-and-retest.",
    "Levels to respect: BSE needs base >2085–2090 (support 2020–2040); MCX reclaim >8000–8050; JINDALSTEL >1070; GRSE >2745; HAL >4825; IDEA >8.35; SUZLON >57.5/58.5; PIDILITIND reclaim >1495–1500; SAIL >134.",
    "Liquidity plan for ₹25k: start with 1–2 liquid, sub-₹1,000 names; avoid high-ticket stocks (KAYNES, AMBER, PAGEIND, DIXON) that force under-sized entries.",
    "Risk plan: cap risk per trade to ~1% of portfolio (~₹250); place stops ~2–3% below entry or below last swing low; predefine targets 1.5–2R; avoid positions if indices gap down and breadth is weak.",
    "Avoid/repair list until signals improve: SUZLON (below support), TRENT (weak trend; needs >4925), IT pack (COFORGE, PERSISTENT, MPHASIS), PIDILITIND (below 1480), hospital/diagnostics (NH, LALPATHLAB) unless reversal triggers appear.",
    "Execution: If triggers open above levels, wait 15–30 minutes for a retest and volume confirmation; if opening at support, require clear reversal candle + rising intraday volume.",
    "No trades executed today; weekend focus: finalize alerts and position sizes for 1–2 starter entries contingent on Monday market tone and triggers."
  ]
}
